allow: Bash(gh repo create bybit-mcp --public --source=. --push --description "Bybit Trading MCP Server for Claude - Deployable to Google Cloud Run")
Bash(gcloud services enable run.googleapis.com artifactregistry.googleapis.com secretmanager.googleapis.com cloudbuild.googleapis.com --project=bybit-mcp-trading)
Bash(gcloud artifacts repositories create bybit-mcp --repository-format=docker --location=us-east1 --description="Bybit MCP Docker images" --project=bybit-mcp-trading)
Bash(__NEW_LINE_aa39676bc35c9e88__ echo "Service account created and roles granted.")

Bash(gcloud run deploy bybit-mcp --image "$IMAGE:latest" --region us-east1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --port 8080 --memory 512Mi --cpu 1 --min-instances 0 --max-instances 3 --set-secrets "BYBIT_API_KEY=bybit-api-key:latest,BYBIT_API_SECRET=bybit-api-secret:latest,MCP_AUTH_TOKEN=mcp-auth-token:latest" --set-env-vars "BYBIT_TESTNET=true" --project bybit-mcp-trading)
Bash(gcloud run services delete bybit-mcp --region us-east1 --project bybit-mcp-trading --quiet)
